name.ja: <ruby>焔<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>聖<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>騎<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>－リッチャルデット

text.en: You can banish this card from your hand or GY; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower FIRE Warrior monster from your hand as a Tuner. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower FIRE Warrior monster in your GY, except "Infernoble Knight - Ricciardetto"; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Warrior monsters. You can only use 1 "Infernoble Knight - Ricciardetto" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
